Yes, was Hinduism, not Hindhuism; and reincarnate, not reencarnate... a grammar mistake, Im sorry. An about the plot: WHATEVER... is porn, dont think much about the logic. In any case, is an open ending of a guy who is too dumb to accept that he is "popular" with women.
What the hinhuistic f are you talking about xkaratekazx lol

The whole series get a lot of facts of Hindhuism... the religion of the India. In Hindhuism Mahavarata (religious book), many womens became goddesses for became wifes of some gods. Even you can become a god if you die and reencarnate with a "Extreme Positive Karma", and become a devil good (asura) if you are extremely evil. 

The heavens or hells in Hindhuism is only a "temporary place" for souls before they reincarnate in something (a god, a ghost, a human or a animal). 

The japanese only get reincarnation in his beliefs because the Buddhism import that belief from the Hindhuism, except that Buddhism hate or distrust the gods and the karma.

To explain the whole series: In a world with "Hindhuism gods" and "reencarnation", a family of  father, mother, son and daughter die in a car accident. Only the daughter survived, and taken cared by his aunt (15).

In a Hindu heaven, the mother get sex with hindu gods and became a goddess (11) ; with her new powers she create a "virtual reality" where her Child```'s soul live a fantasy life of a ordinary japanese for 16 years, and get sex with "virtual souls" based of real girls of the Living World; in a eternal loop of 1 day. This is supposed a pay of the gods to the Child for have a "good karma" and "Dying virgin" (LMAO) (1-12).

The boy discover this, and choose at the end get sex with his sister (14). His dad and mom go to The Nirvana.

But, like a god's prank (the author), the boy reencarnate as his sister's son, and 16 years later, he encounter in his school evey real girls from whom the "Virtual souls" were based now in deeply love with him, even his sister- now mother.
